item.title: Light Fellowship - blog
item.description: I made this photography blog summer 2019, when I studied abroad in Beijing as a Richard U. Light fellow. It was my first time in nearly 10 years that I was back in China, and I wanted to explore how the country and its culture had changed through photography.

item.title: alexchendesigns
item.description: Created this Instagram account to showcase some of my favorite photos. I’ve tried making photography portfolio websites in the past, but I find it takes too much effort to manage.
